info.description: Chorus =================================================== **Chorus** is a simple chemical structure modeling toolkit. Installation ------------- ### PyPI .. code-block:: pip3 install chorus ### Anaconda .. code-block:: conda upgrade -n root conda conda install -n root conda-build conda skeleton pypi chorus conda build chorus conda install --use-local chorus Dependency ------------ - matplotlib - networkx - numpy - numexpr - pyyaml - cython (recommended) Features ---------- - Structure image export (SVG, PNG) - PNG - SVG - Import from/export to .sdf, .mol - Import from/export to RDKit molecule - Molecular property calculation (MW, Chemical formula) - Descriptors - H-bond donor/acceptor - Wildman-Crippen logP - Aromaticity - Topological recognition(ring, scaffold, connectivity) - Sub(super)structure search - MCS with diameter restriction (MCS-DR) and graph-based local similarity (GLS) Features (WIP) ------------------------------- - Functional group recognition - Markush structue - Import SMILES and compute 2D coordinate - Faster substructure match Features (will never be implemented) ------------------------------------- - Python 2 compatibility - Fingerprint similarity - And many of the features already available in RDKit API Documentation ------------------------ https://mojaie.github.io/chorus/docs License ------------- `MIT license ` except for external resources (see resources/README.md) Copyright -------------- (C) 2014-2017 Seiji Matsuoka
